Name: SISO-RAW
Source: GIMSCOP, Federal University of Rio Grande do Sul
Summary: SISO-RAW contains raw data from 52 control loops in the oil and gas sector, recorded over two and a half days. It includes variables like OP, PV, SP, and MV, stored in an HDF5 file.

Sections.Title: Dataset Information
Sections.Content: This dataset captures controller outputs, process variables, setpoints, and valve stem positions from various control loops, with variable sampling times. The data is essential for understanding loop behaviors and dynamics.
